statements: SELECT * FROM energy_storage_systems;
SELECT id, date, energy_in FROM energy_storage_systems ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, energy_out FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE energy_out > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE charging_strategy = 'fast';
SELECT id, date, discharging_strategy FROM energy_storage_systems ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, date, energy_in, energy_out, charging_strategy, discharging_strategy FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE energy_in > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, charging_strategy, discharging_strategy FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE charging_strategy = 'Fast' AND discharging_strategy = 'Slow'
SELECT date, energy_in, energy_out FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE energy_out > energy_in ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY energy_in DESC
SELECT id, energy_in, charging_strategy FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE charging_strategy LIKE '%flex%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_storage WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, energy_generated FROM energy_storage WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT id, date, charging_duration FROM charging_strategies ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, charging_duration FROM charging_strategies WHERE charging_efficiency >= 0.9;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, date, energy_consumed, energy_generated FROM energy_storage WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, energy_generated FROM energy_storage WHERE energy_generated BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY energy_generated ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, date, charging_duration FROM charging_strategies WHERE charging_duration > 4 AND charging_efficiency < 0.8 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date, charging_efficiency FROM charging_strategies WHERE charging_duration = 6 OR charging_duration = 8 ORDER BY charging_duration ASC, date DESC LIMIT 4;

SELECT id, date, energy_consumed, energy_generated FROM energy_storage JOIN charging_strategies ON energy_storage.id = charging_strategies.id WHERE energy_generated > 800 AND charging_duration < 5 ORDER BY date ASC, charging_duration DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_systems;
SELECT storage_name, capacity FROM energy_storage_systems ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE energy_level > 50;
SELECT storage_id, timestamp, energy_level FROM historical_data WHERE temperature < 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT storage_id, strategy_description FROM optimization_strategies WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_systems ORDER BY capacity DESC, storage_name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT id, storage_name, capacity, charge_rate FROM energy_storage_systems WHERE charge_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY storage_name;
SELECT storage_id, energy_level, temperature FROM historical_data WHERE energy_level < 50 AND temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM optimization_strategies WHERE implementation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY strategy_id;
SELECT strategy_id, storage_id, strategy_description FROM optimization_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_system;
SELECT date, charging_strategy FROM energy_storage_system WHERE charging_strategy = 'Peak-Shaving';
SELECT date, temperature FROM historical_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, date FROM charging_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT date, discharging_rate FROM discharging_data WHERE discharging_rate < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_system ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT date, charging_strategy, discharging_strategy FROM energy_storage_system WHERE charging_strategy = 'Fast Charge';
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE energy_level > 50 AND temperature < 30;
SELECT date, charging_rate FROM charging_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY charging_rate DESC;
SELECT date, discharging_rate FROM discharging_data WHERE discharging_rate > 5 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM BatteryInfo ORDER BY date_time DESC, energy_level ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT battery_id, energy_level FROM BatteryInfo WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT battery_id, date_time FROM EnergyData WHERE charging_status = TRUE ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM ChargingHistory WHERE energy_added > 50 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT battery_id, recommendation_text FROM ChargingRecommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT battery_id, energy_level, temperature FROM BatteryInfo WHERE energy_level > 50 ORDER BY energy_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChargingRecommendations WHERE recommendation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT battery_id, start_time, end_time, energy_added FROM ChargingHistory WHERE energy_added > 100 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyData WHERE charging_status = TRUE AND temperature > 25;
SELECT battery_id, MAX(energy_level) AS max_energy_level, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM BatteryInfo GROUP BY battery_id;
